lead_paragraph: Switzerland midfielder Granit Xhaka said he was eager to learn from team mates Mesut Ozil, Alexis Sanchez and Santi Cazorla at Arsenal in order to cement his place in manager Arsene Wenger's team.

headline.print_headline: Xhaka Keen to Hone His Skills Under 'World Class' Arsenal Trio
headline.main: Xhaka Keen to Hone His Skills Under 'World Class' Arsenal Trio

snippet: Switzerland midfielder Granit Xhaka said he was eager to learn from team mates Mesut Ozil, Alexis Sanchez and Santi Cazorla at Arsenal in order to cement his place in manager Arsene Wenger's team....
